amendment.description: At the end of the bill, add the following: SEC. 504. STATE OF CALIFORNIA WATER REFORM LAWS. Nothing in this Act or the amendments made by this Act shall interfere with the State of California's Delta and water management reform and funding bills of 2009, including SB7x-1, SB7x-2, SB7x-6, and SB7x-7.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 113-340 to prevent provisions of the bill from taking effect until it has been determined that it will not interfere with the State of California's Delta and water management reform and funding Acts of 2009, including SB7x-1, SB7x-2, SB7x-6, and SB7x-7.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 46).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 231 (Roll no. 46).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Huffman.
